name: Beginning Guitar
description: Have fun learning to play the guitar. We will start by learning how to press, pick, and strum. As the session progresses, we will move on to easy chords, scales, and rhythms that we can use to play some of our favorite songs in different musical styles. Student must bring their own beginner youth student guitar to class. We do not have any guitars to practice with in class.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
keywords: we are a family with children under 18 years old.
i am part of a family with children under 18 years old.
